title: How to export a Google Doc to PDF in Google Drive
content:
Google Docs has been a go-to product for many for quite a long time. Google Drive can handle complex text documents, as well as easy and simple tasks. One of those is exporting text documents as PDFs. Here’s how to export PDFs in Google Docs.

more…

The post How to export a Google Doc to PDF in Google Drive appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Google Docs is a popular document creator from Google. Of course, that means Google Docs can export PDFs for you as well. Here's how.
